statements: SELECT * FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, productivity_score FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE efficiency_score > 80;
SELECT team_name, communication_score FROM team_performance_metrics ORDER BY communication_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE productivity_score < 50 AND efficiency_score < 60;
SELECT team_id, team_name, productivity_score FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE team_name LIKE 'Dev%';
SELECT team_name, productivity_score FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE efficiency_score > 80 ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, communication_score FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE productivity_score < 50 ORDER BY communication_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE productivity_score BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY efficiency_score DESC;
SELECT team_name, productivity_score, efficiency_score FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE communication_score > 70 ORDER BY productivity_score ASC, efficiency_score DESC;
SELECT AVG(productivity_score) AS avg_productivity_score, AVG(communication_score) AS avg_communication_score FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE efficiency_score < 70;
SELECT * FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE team_name = 'Marketing'
SELECT team_name, productivity_score, satisfaction_score FROM team_performance_metrics ORDER BY productivity_score DESC
SELECT team_name, AVG(productivity_score) AS avg_productivity FROM team_performance_metrics GROUP BY team_name HAVING avg_productivity > 80
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE team_id = 1 AND start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS total_members FROM team_members GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY total_members DESC
SELECT team_name, productivity_score, satisfaction_score FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE productivity_score > 75.5;
SELECT team_name, AVG(productivity_score) AS avg_productivity FROM team_performance_metrics GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT member_name, role, team_name FROM team_members JOIN team_performance_metrics ON team_members.team_id = team_performance_metrics.id;
SELECT team_name, satisfaction_score FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(member_id) AS total_members FROM team_members GROUP BY team_name HAVING COUNT(member_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, joining_date FROM team_members WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM team_metrics WHERE metric_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM team_events ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM team_events WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE team_id=1 ORDER BY joining_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, joining_date FROM team_members WHERE joining_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_id, COUNT(*) FROM team_metrics GROUP BY team_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM team_events WHERE team_id=2 ORDER BY event_time ASC;
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) FROM team_metrics GROUP BY metric_name HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT id, name, email FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT name, role FROM team_members ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE deadline >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, assignee_id, completed FROM tasks WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT task_name, assignee_id, deadline FROM tasks WHERE completed = FALSE ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT log_id, task_id, log_timestamp FROM task_logs WHERE task_id = 10 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, email, role FROM team_members WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT AVG(metric_value), MAX(metric_value), MIN(metric_value) FROM team_metrics WHERE metric_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, position FROM team_members WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM team_tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT meeting_date, meeting_time, meeting_notes FROM team_meetings WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT feedback_text, submitted_by, feedback_date FROM team_feedback WHERE task_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_id, member_name, position FROM team_members WHERE team_id = 1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_status, deadline FROM team_tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT member_name, progress_percentage, last_updated FROM team_members INNER JOIN task_progress ON team_members.member_id = task_progress.member_id WHERE progress_percentage >= 50;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_time, meeting_notes FROM team_meetings WHERE team_id = 2;
